forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thundershowers overnight following a period of rain early. Low 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
